title: BikeRadar Meets podcast | Luisa Grappone, Hunt engineering and product manager
content:
In this latest episode of BikeRadar Meets, technical writer Simon Bromley talks to Luisa Grappone, engineering and product manager at Hunt Bike Wheels.

An aerodynamics and composite materials expert, Luisa worked on Boeing’s 787 programme, and at 3T and Campagnolo, before joining Hunt in August 2017.

Simon and Luisa delve deep into the technical aspects of making wheels for some of the fastest cyclists in the world, and chat about how smaller companies like Hunt are able to move quickly and innovate in a crowded market.
